scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=apps/api & npm run dev --workspace=apps/web
scripts.deploy:api: npm run build --workspace=apps/api && sudo systemctl restart weather-station-api && sudo journalctl -u weather-station-api -f
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build --workspace=apps/web && sudo systemctl restart weather-station-web && sudo journalctl -u weather-station-web -f
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
